content: this crochet hat with folded over brim features a distinctive knit-like texture achieved through special but easy crochet stitches providing both elasticity and warmth the hat is worked flat in turned row from side to side from the brim to the crown with a pattern repeat of 4 row that is easy to memorize **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 5 check out my youtube channel 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 6 https //www youtube com/c/myhobbyiscrochetblog
